title: The Grand Navaratna Kundan Haaram: A Timeless Treasure
materials: 22K Gold (916 Hallmark) with Hyderabadi Kundan setting. Adorned with Polki Diamonds
features: Elaborate Kundan setting showcases exceptional craftsmanship. Features intricate floral and paisley (manga malai) designs. The central pendant incorporates a traditional Jhumka-inspired design with pearl drops. The necklace's base is designed for comfortable wear. Antique Gold finish for a rich, heirloom look.
colors: Dominantly Gold with Sparkling White Diamonds. Accented with vibrant Green Emeralds and lustrous Creamy White Pearls.
occasions: and grand receptions. Also suitable for important family functions like seemantham and half-saree functions.
description: This Kundan Haaram is a masterpiece of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The combination of Polki diamonds and Emeralds offers a captivating sparkle, while the South Sea Pearls add a touch of elegance. The heirloom quality and timeless design make it a valuable investment for generations to come. Its unique design makes it both traditional and suitable for modern brides looking for a vintage aesthetic.
